headline: Why CarMax (KMX) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of used automotive vehicle retailer Carmax (NYSE:KMX) jumped 2.8% in the afternoon session as the stock attempted a slight recovery after a major sell-off prompted by the sudden termination of its CEO and a dire preliminary financial report. The steep drop in the stock's price followed the company's announcement that CEO Bill Nash had been fired. CarMax also issued a disappointing preliminary outlook for its third quarter, forecasting a decrease in comparable store sales of 8% to 12%. In
